requiredModal.title: Authentication is required.
requiredModal.description: You need to sign in to your account.

confirmModal.title: Log out of Twitter?
confirmModal.description: You can always log back in at any time.

displayLanguage.title: Display language
displayLanguage.description: Select your preferred language for headlines, buttons, and other text from X on this account. This does not change the language of the content you see in your timeline.

welcome.title: Welcome to X!
welcome.description: This is the best place to see what’s happening in your world. Find some people and topics to follow now.

empty.title: You don’t have any posts yet
empty.description: Your posts will show up here.

discardChangesModal.title: Discard changes?
discardChangesModal.description: This can’t be undone and you’ll lose your changes.

empty.title: Lights, camera … attachments!
empty.description: When you post photos or videos, they will show up here.

empty.title: You don’t have any likes yet
empty.description: Tap the heart on any post to show it some love. When you do, it’ll show up here.

notFoundPage.title: Hmm...this page doesn’t exist. Try searching for something else.

deleteConfirmModal.title: Delete post?
deleteConfirmModal.description: This can’t be undone and it will be removed from your profile, the timeline of any accounts that follow you, and from search results.

password.min: Password must be at least {min} characters.
password.max: Password can't have more than {max} characters.

username.incorrect: Invalid characters or too many blank spaces.
username.min: Your username cannot be shorter than {min} characters.
username.max: Your username cannot be longer than {max} characters.

name.min: Your name cannot be shorter than {min} characters.
name.max: Your name cannot be longer than {max} characters.

image.sizeLimit: Maximum image size exceeded. Please choose an image under {sizeLimit} MB.
